name: A useless platformer
description:
This is a little game project that I am working on now it has a lot of bugs and issues and the other problem is technically THIS IS NOT A GAME it is just a thing tat you can move your character and kill some enemies no story no levels I'm putting it to itch.io to just see is it going in a good way or not

HOW TO PLAY:

Arrow keys to move up arrow to jump 

Z Attack

X Defence

C Roll
